prompt:
Generate retrieval-optimized clothing tokens only. Exactly two lines.

Line 1: CAPTION: <single sentence (â‰¤20 words) describing upper, lower OR dress, shoes, and bag only>.
Line 2: TAGS: <comma-separated tokens limited to clothing+bag>: top-<type>-<color>; outerwear-<type>-<color>; bottom-<type>-<color> OR dress-<color>; shoes-<type>-<color>; bag-<type>-<color> OR no-bag.

Rules:
- Allowed colors: black, white, gray, brown, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, beige.
- Allowed clothing types: T-shirt, shirt, blouse, hoodie, sweater, jacket, coat, vest, jeans, trousers, pants, shorts, skirt, dress, sneakers, shoes, boots, backpack, shoulder bag, tote, handbag.
- Omit hair, accessories, pattern/logo unless striking; if absent, do not add "no-*" except no-bag.
- No actions, camera/view, identity/age/race, or hedging.

Output format:
CAPTION: <sentence>
TAGS: <tokens>
